name: impishness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that shows someone enjoys causing trouble, but that may be funny and attractive: He is bursting with youthful impishness. Occasional impishness undermines his usual pessimism. See
impish
More examplesFewer examplesShe surprised herself with her own impishness.I had an urge for ice cream and, with the impishness of a toddler, I went out and got some.His impishness quickly won us over.
